Class GameFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

                  edu.american.GameFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Painter, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GameFrame
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Painter

The game play window on which the background, player, and npcs are drawn.

Author:
fleck, myers

matrix

private byte[][] matrix
Stores a matrix showing where the tunnels can be. These are essentially valid player locations.

painters

private java.util.ArrayList<Painter> painters
Everything that shows up on the screen, must be a Painter. This ArrayList holds all the Painters.

tunnels

private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Rectangle> tunnels
Holds the tunnels. Basically, a parsed map.
